title.part1: Because every search starts with a huddle

hero.desc: At Huddle – we are redefining tech recruitment – by delivering new ways the market’s best opportunities meet the industry’s top-tier talent.

lookingForAJob.desc: Transform your tech career with Huddle. Reach out to find opportunities that meet your aspirations or for more helpful information.

home.desc: Enhance your workforce with exceptional tech talent. Source visionary engineers, innovative designers, and critical industry experts to gain a competitive edge in today's rapidly evolving technology landscape.

cv.title: Be sent 3 CVs with no obligations
cv.text: Instantly discover talent by receiving three targeted CVs via our proprietary candidate sourcing tech – commitment-free.

lookingToHire.desc: Build your team through our strategic permanent hiring solutions. Elevate the workforce with skilled professionals for lasting growth and sustained success.

cv.title: Be sent 3 CVs with no obligations
cv.text: Instantly discover talent by receiving three targeted CVs via our proprietary candidate sourcing tech – commitment-free.

specialisms.title: Specialisms
specialisms.desc: Our expansive team of experts covers a diverse array of fields, enabling us to provide comprehensive solutions across various specialisms.

sectors.title: Sectors
sectors.desc: Our company's versatility spans across numerous sectors, allowing us to customise solutions for distinct challenges and niche opportunities.

contract.desc: Optimise project delivery with our agile contract hiring. Our skilled professionals seamlessly integrate into your work-streams, guaranteeing results.

executiveSearch.desc: Our comprehensive and highly-successful approach to executive recruitment encompasses four key stages – client research and needs assessment, executive identification and outreach, assessment and evaluation, and offer management and onboarding.

1.title: Research & needs assessment
1.text: By consulting clients, creating detailed role specifications, and analysing markets, we grasp your needs and conditions, enabling a precise recruitment strategy.

2.title: Executive identification & outreach
2.text: Through a blend of diverse sourcing, discreet outreach, and meticulous long-listing, we connect with candidates meeting criteria and expressing genuine interest.

3.title: Assessment & evaluation
3.text: Thorough interviews, reference validation, and assessments such as psychometric tests ensure the selection qualified, compatible candidates, enhancing your recruitment process.

4.title: Offer management & onboarding
4.text: We curate a refined shortlist based on our evaluations, expertly manage offers and negotiations while you conduct interviews, and assist seamless new role transitions.

embeddedTalent.desc: Our embedded talent solutions cover onboarding, resource management, performance monitoring, and transitions. From seamless integration to skill management, performance alignment, and smooth exits, our approach ensures a highly-successful collaborative journey.

1.title: Onboarding & integration
1.text: We can guarantee seamless assimilation of external talent. Through processes, tools, training, and alignment with your culture and objectives, we ensure their swift integration.

2.title: Resource & skill management
2.text: We perform skill assessments, targeted talent acquisition, gap analysis, talent pools, and ongoing learning to ensure your projects access the right expertise for success.

3.title: Performance monitoring & feedback
3.text: We ensure external talent's alignment with your company goals, with use of metrics, check-ins, feedback, KPIs, and reviews for effective collaboration and measurable success.

4.title: Transition & off-boarding
4.text: We promise to provide smooth talent exits, role shifts, knowledge transfers, structured protocols, feedback, evaluations, and potential future engagements, optimising collaboration value.

workForUs.desc: Discover more about our innovative company and game-changing service to further ignite your enthusiasm for Huddle.

container.title: Want to work for us?
container.text: If you're enthusiastic about joining our incredibly talented team, be sure to monitor the open roles at Huddle.

form.title: Take a moment to talk to the team
form.text: Feel free to send us a message and we will be sure to get back to you as soon as possible.

join.title: Join thousands of subscribers
join.text: Be the first to know when we announce new roles, service updates, and other communications.

follow.title: Follow the team @huddlesearch
follow.text: Make sure you’re following us across social media to keep up-to-date with new roles and more.

corporateMeasure.desc: Our CSR principles and initiatives are founded on a rock-solid dedication to measurable impact and unwavering accountability. We believe in not just setting goals but tracking our progress meticulously to ensure we fulfil our promise of a better tomorrow.

1.title: Impact assessment excellence
1.text: We assess our CSR efforts rigorously, combining quantitative metrics and real-life stories to understand our impact.

2.title: Transparent reporting
2.text: Our reports are honest narratives, sharing our successes, setbacks, and lessons learned.

3.title: Stakeholder engagement
3.text: We actively involve employees, partners, customers, and communities, aligning our initiatives with their needs.

corporateMeasure.desc2: With this plan, we measure our impact, share it transparently, and ensure accountability, creating a better, more sustainable future together.

diversityMeasure.desc: We believe in accountability. To measure our progress, we set specific, measurable, and time-bound goals related to diversity, equity, and inclusion. We regularly review our progress, make adjustments, and share updates transparently.

1.title: Strategic goal setting
1.text: We establish clear, measurable, and time-bound goals in diversity, equity, and inclusion. These goals serve as our roadmap for progress.

2.title: Continuous evaluation
2.text: Regular assessments and reviews help us track our journey. We analyse data, gather feedback, and make necessary adjustments to stay on course.

3.title: Transparent reporting
3.text: Our commitment to accountability extends to transparent reporting. We openly share our progress, achievements, and areas where improvement is needed, fostering trust and collaboration.

diversityMeasure.desc2: With this plan, we measure our commitment to DEI, ensuring that our efforts translate into meaningful change within our organization and for the communities we serve.

leadership.title: Leadership Team
leadership.desc: Our distinguished leadership team comprises of three seasoned industry experts, each bringing a wealth of experience and boasting a proven track record of driving innovation and success.

specialists.title: Specialists in {{name}}
specialists.desc: Our specialists comprise of a diverse group of experts, all of which experienced in a broad array of industry sectors and specialisms, ensuring both our clients and candidates receive an unprecedented level of service.

leadershipTeam.desc: Our distinguished leadership team comprises of three seasoned industry experts, each bringing a wealth of experience and boasting a proven track record of driving innovation and success.

ourStory.desc: Our company is the culmination of our three founders' extensive career journeys. In establishing Huddle, they have formed a powerhouse committed to the innovation of tech recruitment and the experience that hiring companies and job seekers go through.

info.title: The mission statement...
info.text: Our mission is to revolutionise the recruitment landscape by delivering exceptional results through innovative practices. We are dedicated to exceeding client expectations by leveraging cutting-edge approaches that consistently source, assess, and match top-tier talent. Through our unwavering commitment to excellence and continuous innovation, we strive to transform businesses and careers, driving success and shaping the future of recruitment.

title.part1: Leveraging AI tech to service clients at

ourProcess.desc: Talent acquisition is being redefined thanks to our cutting-edge, in-house proprietary artificial intelligence technology, which streamlines the end-to-end process to deliver the most qualified candidates efficiently and with unprecedented precision.

1.title: Simultaneous talent pool targeting
1.text: We run concurrent searches on internal and external sources e.g. pro networks and job boards.

2.title: Extensive data analysis
2.text: We accurately examine suitable candidates with unparalleled position specificity.

3.title: Supercharged candidate sourcing
3.text: We intelligently identify and effectively engage with highly-qualified individuals.

title.part1: A specialised service powered by AI

executiveSearch.desc: Talent acquisition is being redefined thanks to our cutting-edge, in-house proprietary artificial intelligence technology, which streamlines the end-to-end process to deliver the most qualified executive candidates efficiently and with unprecedented precision.

workForUs.desc: If you're enthusiastic about joining our incredibly talented team, be sure to monitor the open roles at Huddle.

title.part1: We’d love you to give us a

contactUs.desc: Reach out to the team to ask a question, or to simply find out more about our innovative company and game-changing service.

corporate.desc: We believe that success is not just about business growth; it's also about contributing to a better world. At Huddle, we're committed to making a positive impact on society and the environment, aligning our values with our mission to connect top talent with businesses.

1.title: Ethical business conduct
1.text: Upholding strong ethical standards in all our actions and decisions.

2.title: Environmental stewardship
2.text: Responsibly managing our environmental footprint and promoting sustainable practices.

3.title: Community engagement
3.text: Actively engaging with and supporting our local communities.

4.title: Diversity & inclusion
4.text: Fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace and culture.

5.title: Employee well-being
5.text: Prioritising the health, safety, and development of our employees.

6.title: Transparency & accountability
6.text: Regularly assessing and sharing the impact of our CSR initiatives.

diversity.desc: We believe that diversity is a strength, equity is a necessity, and inclusion is a commitment. At Unitas, we’re dedicated to fostering a workplace where every individual feels valued, empowered, and supported, regardless of background.

1.title: Diversity & inclusion
1.text: We embrace diversity in all its forms, including but not limited to race, ethnicity, gender, age, sexual orientation, abilities, and backgrounds. We believe that a diverse workforce drives innovation.

2.title: Equity & access
2.text: Equity is at the core of our DEI efforts. We are dedicated to dismantling systemic barriers and ensuring that every employee has equal opportunities for growth, development, and advancement.

3.title: Inclusive culture
3.text: We foster an inclusive culture where everyone feels a sense of belonging. Inclusion is about actively inviting and valuing different perspectives, experiences, and identities.

ourStory.title: Values that make us who we are
ourStory.desc: We abide by five core company values which serve as the compass that directs our actions, shapes our culture, and fuels our commitment to excellence.

1.title: Integrity
1.text: Upholding the highest ethical standards in every interaction and decision.

2.title: Transparency
2.text: Fostering open communication and trust, ensuring clarity in all engagements.

3.title: Honesty
3.text: Embracing truthfulness and sincerity, building authentic relationships with clients and candidates.

4.title: Efficiency
4.text: Streamlining processes and delivering prompt, effective solutions to meet client needs.

5.title: Excellence
5.text: Demonstrating meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to achieving remarkable results for clients and candidates alike.

ourProcess.title: Why it’s great for clients
ourProcess.desc: Our AI technology provides us, and our clients, a plethora of advantages, such as expanded candidate talent pools, higher candidate quality, unbiased selection, reduced time-to-fill, and cost savings for hiring companies.

1.title: Larger candidate talent pools
1.text: Expanding candidate talent pools to ensure a comprehensive and diverse sourcing approach.

2.title: Higher quality of candidates & key info
2.text: Elevating candidate quality by accessing key information for more informed and effective decision-making.

3.title: No bias, complying with inclusion policies
3.text: Ensuring an unbiased and equitable selection process, in strict compliance with inclusion policies.

4.title: Overall time-to-fill is reduced
4.text: Significantly reducing the overall time-to-fill vacancies, streamlining the recruitment journey.

5.title: Cost savings are passed to hiring companies
5.text: Passing on cost savings directly to hiring companies, optimising resource allocation and maximising value.

executiveSearch.title: Why Executive Search is great for clients
executiveSearch.desc: Our process encompasses comprehensive research, diverse candidate sourcing, thorough evaluation, and streamlined offer management and onboarding, ensuring a seamless transition into new roles for top-tier executive talent.

1.title: Research & needs assessment
1.text: By consulting clients, creating detailed role specifications, and analysing markets, we grasp your needs and conditions, enabling a precise recruitment strategy.

2.title: Executive identification & outreach
2.text: Through a blend of diverse sourcing, discreet outreach, and meticulous long-listing, we connect with candidates meeting criteria and expressing genuine interest.

3.title: Assessment & evaluation
3.text: Thorough interviews, reference validation, and assessments such as psychometric tests ensure the selection qualified, compatible candidates, enhancing your recruitment process.

4.title: Offer management & onboarding
4.text: We curate a refined shortlist based on our evaluations, expertly manage offers and negotiations while you conduct interviews, and assist seamless new role transitions.

contractInterim.title: Why our contract service is great for clients
contractInterim.desc: Our streamlined contract service encompasses effective client engagement, candidate sourcing and shortlisting, interview coordination, seamless onboarding, performance monitoring, and contract management for a comprehensive and smooth transition.

1.title: Client engagement & requirement understanding
1.text: We initiate communication, gather comprehensive job specifications, and establish clear contract terms to lay the groundwork for a successful partnership.

2.title: Candidate sourcing & shortlisting
2.text: Our candidate sourcing and shortlisting strategy involves diverse channels, thorough screening, and meticulous evaluation, resulting in a refined shortlist of the most fitting candidates for the next selection stage.

3.title: Interview & selection process
3.text: We manage interview coordination, gather feedback for refinement, and facilitate offer negotiation to ensure a seamless transition for the chosen candidate.

4.title: Onboarding & contract management
4.text: We finalise contracts, guide seamless candidate onboarding, monitor performance, and discuss contract renewal or conclusion for a smooth transition.

embeddedTalent.title: Why embedding Huddle is great for clients
embeddedTalent.desc: Our services ensure seamless assimilation of external talent, expert resource management, performance alignment through metrics and feedback, and smooth transitions for optimised collaboration.

1.title: Onboarding & integration
1.text: We can guarantee seamless assimilation of external talent. Through processes, tools, training, and alignment with your culture and objectives, we ensure their swift integration.

2.title: Resource & skill management
2.text: We perform skill assessments, targeted talent acquisition, gap analysis, talent pools, and ongoing learning to ensure your projects access the right expertise for success.

3.title: Performance monitoring & feedback
3.text: We ensure external talent's alignment with your company goals, with use of metrics, check-ins, feedback, KPIs, and reviews for effective collaboration and measurable success.

4.title: Transition & off-boarding
4.text: We promise to provide smooth talent exits, role shifts, knowledge transfers, structured protocols, feedback, evaluations, and potential future engagements, optimising collaboration value.

permanentHires.title: Why our permanent hire service is great for clients
permanentHires.desc: Our comprehensive permanent hire service blends expert candidate sourcing, efficient interviews, skilled negotiations, seamless onboarding, and industry insights, all under dedicated consultancy. This ensures efficient talent acquisition, smooth transitions, and informed decisions.

1.title: Strategic Candidate Search & Skill Assessment
1.text: We employ an expansive network and meticulous screening to source candidates who possess both the necessary skills and a cultural fit, ensuring a harmonious team integration and optimal performance.

2.title: Efficient Interview Coordination
2.text: Our streamlined process saves you time and ensures seamless communication with candidates. This enhances their experience, accelerates the hiring process, and maintains a positive impression of your organisation.

3.title: Expert Negotiation Support
3.text: With our seasoned negotiators at your side, you can confidently extend competitive offers. This minimises any potential delays in finalising candidate acceptance and secures top talent for your team.

4.title: Seamless Onboarding & Support
4.text: We guide candidates through a comprehensive onboarding process, ensuring a smooth transition into their roles. This personalised approach contributes to higher retention rates and cultivates a satisfied and productive workforce.

5.title: Industry Insights & Dedicated Consultant
5.text: Benefit from our industry expertise, gaining insights into market trends and salary benchmarks. Your dedicated consultant offers personalised guidance, ensuring your recruitment strategy aligns with your organisation's goals and objectives.

corporate.title: Core initiatives for corporate social responsibility
corporate.desc: Our CSR includes eco-friendly practices, diverse hiring, community outreach, ethical sourcing, and employee empowerment for a positive impact on the environment, society, and our team.

1.title: Green practices
1.text: We're eco-conscious. From waste reduction to energy efficiency, we implement sustainable practices in our offices, contributing to a greener future.

2.title: Diversity in recruitment
2.text: We champion diversity. Our recruitment process promotes equal opportunities for candidates of all backgrounds, fostering an inclusive workforce.

3.title: Community outreach
3.text: We serve our communities. Volunteering and supporting charitable causes close to our hearts is how we give back.

4.title: Ethical sourcing
4.text: We partner ethically. Our supply chain adheres to ethical and sustainable practices, reflecting our commitment to responsible sourcing.

5.title: Employee power
5.text: Our team is our strength. We invest in employee development, training, and well-being, ensuring a motivated and satisfied workforce.

diversity.title: Core commitments to diversity, equality & inclusion
diversity.desc: We wholeheartedly embrace DEI, from leadership's example to education, inclusive hiring, ERGs, supplier diversity, and community involvement, infusing it throughout our organisation.

1.title: Leadership buy-in
1.text: Our leadership team is committed to leading by example. They champion DEI initiatives and set the tone for our entire organisation.

2.title: Education & training
2.text: We provide ongoing DEI education and training to all employees. This includes workshops, webinars, and resources that promote understanding and awareness.

3.title: Recruitment & hiring
3.text: We actively seek diverse talent and employ inclusive hiring practices to ensure our workforce represents the communities we serve.

4.title: Employee resource groups (ERGs)
4.text: We support ERGs, which provide safe spaces for employees to connect, share experiences, and advocate for change.

5.title: Community engagement
5.text: Our commitment extends beyond our workplace. We engage with and support organisations and initiatives that promote DEI in our communities.

specialisms.architecture: At Huddle, we specialise in recruiting for a spectrum of Architecture roles, from Solutions and Enterprise Architects to Infrastructure and Cloud Architects. Whether you're shaping digital strategy or implementing foundational systems, we connect premier talent with leading organisations in the Architecture domain.
specialisms.change-and-transformation: Change & Transformation encompasses a range of roles, from Change Managers, Business Analysts, and Project Leaders, to Transformation Consultants. We specialise in recruiting top-tier talent for each unique position, ensuring businesses adapt, innovate, and thrive in today's ever-evolving landscape.
specialisms.cloud-infrastructure-and-networks: At Huddle, we specialise in recruiting top talent for a diverse range of Cloud, Infrastructure & Networks roles. Whether you're seeking expertise in public, private, or hybrid cloud, traditional IT infrastructure, or advanced network configurations, our dedicated team is adept at finding the perfect fit for every niche requirement.
specialisms.cyber-and-information-security: We recruit for a diverse range of Cyber & Information Security roles, from ethical hackers, security architects, and penetration testers to risk analysts and compliance specialists. We understand the intricacies of each position, ensuring the right fit for every security need in today's digital landscape.
specialisms.data-and-analytics: From Data Scientists to Business Intelligence Analysts, our recruitment expertise covers the full spectrum of Data & Analytics roles. Whether you're seeking specialists in data engineering, visualization, or advanced analytics, we connect businesses with top-tier talent, ensuring the right fit for every data-centric position.
specialisms.design: At Huddle, we understand the nuances of Design roles, from the visual brilliance of User Interface (UI) designers to the intuitive expertise of User Experience (UX) specialists. Whether you're seeking pixel-perfect creators or user-centric innovators, we're adept at recruiting top talent across the entire UI/UX spectrum.
specialisms.devops: Discover talent across the diverse spectrum of DevOps roles with us. From Integration Specialists to Infrastructure Automation Engineers, Release Managers to Site Reliability Engineers (SREs), we excel in sourcing the finest professionals for each unique facet of the DevOps lifecycle. Your DevOps recruitment, simplified.
specialisms.erp-crm-and-hr-systems: We specialize in recruiting top talents for a range of roles within the ERP, CRM, and HR Systems sectors. Whether it's analysts, developers, or project managers for platforms like SAP, Oracle, Salesforce, or Workday, we have the expertise to find the perfect fit for your business's unique needs.
specialisms.product-management: We specialise in recruiting for the entire spectrum of Product Management roles: from Product Owners who drive detailed execution, to Product Managers who strategize roadmaps, and Product Leaders who envision the big picture. Whether you're hiring for technical, consumer, or enterprise products, we find the perfect fit for every product niche.
specialisms.software-and-engineering: Our expertise spans the vast landscape of Software Development & Engineering roles. From Front-end Developers, Backend Engineers, Full-Stack Specialists to DevOps Experts, Mobile App Designers, and Systems Architects, we have a deep understanding of the nuances of each position. Partner with us to find the perfect fit for every software niche.

sectors.banking-financial-services-asset-managem: At Huddle, we specialise in sourcing top-tier tech talent for a diverse range of Banking, Financial Services, and Asset Management entities. Whether it's global investment banks, boutique financial consultancies, insurance providers, or hedge funds, our expertise spans across the intricate landscape of the financial world. Through a deep understanding of the unique technological needs of each sector, we're poised to connect our clients with the ideal candidates who can propel their digital advancements. Partner with us for tailored recruitment solutions in the financial tech sphere.
sectors.construction-and-proptech: At Huddle, we specialise in recruitment for the dynamic world of Construction & PropTech. From innovative startups revolutionising the property landscape, to established construction firms integrating cutting-edge technologies, we understand the unique tech needs across the spectrum. Whether you're a BIM software developer, a smart-building IoT pioneer, or a green construction solutions firm, we connect you with top-tier tech talents tailored for your business.
sectors.consulting: At Huddle, we proudly partner with a diverse range of consulting firms, from globally renowned strategy powerhouses to niche tech-focused boutiques. Whether you're an IT consultancy mapping out enterprise solutions, a management consultancy advising on organisational transformations, or a specialised advisor leading in emerging tech sectors, we have the expertise to source top-tier tech talent tailored to your unique needs. Our deep understanding of the consulting landscape ensures you're matched with candidates who drive innovation and results.
sectors.defence: At Huddle, we proudly partner with a diverse range of Defence companies, from established defence contractors to innovative startups. Our expertise covers traditional defence manufacturers, cyber security firms, aerospace innovators, naval design specialists, and advanced technology developers. With a deep understanding of the unique challenges and demands of the defence sector, we're adept at identifying top-tier tech talent suited for the multifaceted landscape of defence industries. Trust us to bridge the gap between your tech vacancies and the industry's best candidates.
sectors.e-commerce: At Huddle, we specialise in recruiting top-tier talent for a diverse range of E-Commerce businesses. From giants in online retailing and B2C marketplaces to innovative B2B platforms, dropshipping ventures, and subscription service providers, we understand the unique challenges and opportunities each model presents. Our deep industry knowledge ensures that we find the right tech professionals to propel any E-Commerce entity forward. Partner with us, and gain a competitive edge with the best in tech talent.
sectors.fintech: At Huddle, we specialise in tech recruitment for a diverse range of FinTech companies. From pioneering digital banks and innovative payment platforms to advanced wealth management tools and cutting-edge insurtech solutions, we understand the unique needs of each niche. Our deep industry knowledge allows us to connect top tech talent with groundbreaking FinTech firms, ensuring a perfect fit that drives both individual and industry growth. Partner with us and propel your FinTech journey forward.
sectors.fmcg-consumer: At Huddle, we specialise in sourcing top-tier tech talent for a diverse range of FMCG/Consumer companies. From global giants in the food and beverage sector to emerging innovators in personal care, household products, and beyond, we understand the unique technological needs of each. Whether you're a niche start-up or an established brand, we're committed to connecting you with the tech professionals that drive your business forward in this fast-paced, consumer-centric landscape.
sectors.healthcare-and-healthtech: At Huddle, we specialise in sourcing top-tier tech talent for a diverse range of Healthcare and HealthTech sectors. From pioneering digital health startups to established e-health platforms, telehealth services, and medical device innovators, we understand the unique needs of each domain. Our vast industry experience enables us to effectively match candidates with the right opportunities, driving innovation and growth in this rapidly evolving field. Partner with us, and let's shape the future of healthcare together.
sectors.insurance-and-insuretech: At Huddle, we specialise in recruiting for a diverse range of Insurance and InsureTech firms. From traditional insurance giants to cutting-edge InsureTech startups, we understand the unique needs of each sector. Whether you're a global carrier, a niche underwriter, a digital-first disruptor, or an innovative platform provider, we have the expertise to match the right tech talent with your organisation. Our commitment is to bridge the gap between world-class tech talent and the evolving insurance industry.
sectors.investment-banking: At Huddle, we specialise in recruiting top-tier tech talent for a diverse range of Investment Banks. From global bulge bracket banks known for their vast operations and multinational presence, to boutique banks focusing on niche markets, and middle-market institutions bridging the gap, we understand the unique tech needs of each. Our expertise extends to serving elite advisory firms and specialised finance providers. Partner with us, and access the finest tech talent tailored to the dynamic world of Investment Banking.
sectors.life-sciences: At Huddle, we specialise in sourcing top-tier tech talent for diverse Life Sciences sectors. From innovative biotech startups pushing the boundaries of medical research to established pharmaceutical giants, diagnostic service providers, and medical device trailblazers, we understand the unique needs of each domain. Our expertise ensures that we find the right fit for tech roles across the spectrum, powering the future of Life Sciences through unmatched talent solutions.
sectors.manufacturing: At Huddle, we understand the diverse landscape of the manufacturing industry. From automotive and aerospace to consumer goods and pharmaceuticals, we've partnered with a myriad of manufacturing sectors to source top-tier tech talent. Our expertise lies in identifying the unique technological needs of each niche and connecting them with professionals who drive innovation. Whether it's robotics in auto production or automation in food processing, our recruitment ensures a tech-savvy future for every manufacturing domain.
sectors.media-and-entertainment: At Huddle, we specialise in tech recruitment for a diverse range of Media & Entertainment sectors. From pioneering streaming services and blockbuster film studios to influential media houses and innovative gaming companies, our expertise spans the vast landscape of entertainment. We understand the unique technological needs of each niche, ensuring we connect top tech talent with the right opportunity. Join us as we bridge the gap between tech brilliance and the world's most compelling media narratives.
sectors.new-tech: At Huddle, we specialise in recruiting top talent for a diverse range of New Tech companies. From AI-driven startups and state-of-the-art biotech firms to trailblazing IoT developers and next-gen software solutions, our expertise covers a broad spectrum of the tech landscape. We understand the unique needs of each sector and have a proven track record of matching skilled professionals with their ideal roles. Partner with us to power your enterprise with the best in tech talent.
sectors.pharmaceutical: At Huddle, we specialise in tech recruitment for a diverse range of pharmaceutical companies. From cutting-edge biotech startups and generics manufacturers to large-scale research-driven pharma giants and over-the-counter (OTC) product leaders, our expertise spans the entire spectrum of the pharmaceutical industry. We understand the unique tech needs of each type of pharma company and are dedicated to connecting them with the ideal candidates to drive innovation and growth. Choose us for precision-matched tech talent in the pharmaceutical domain.
sectors.private-equity: At Huddle, we partner with a diverse range of Private Equity firms, from boutique investment houses to global giants, to source exceptional talent for technology roles. Whether it's for growth equity firms focusing on budding startups, buyout firms acquiring established businesses, or venture capitalists backing innovative tech disruptors, our expertise lies in connecting top-tier technology professionals with Private Equity stakeholders to drive success and innovation. Let us power your PE firm's tech future.
sectors.public-sector: At Huddle, we specialise in tech recruitment for a diverse range of Public Sector organisations. From local government bodies and educational institutions to healthcare providers and emergency services, our expertise covers the spectrum. We understand the unique demands and nuances of each sector, ensuring that we find the perfect tech talent to drive innovation and efficiency. Partner with us and access a vast pool of candidates tailored for the Public Sector's evolving technological needs.
sectors.retail-and-retailtech: At Huddle, we specialise in connecting top-tier talent with a diverse range of Retail & RetailTech companies. From traditional brick-and-mortar establishments to cutting-edge e-commerce platforms, omnichannel solutions providers, and innovative point-of-sale tech startups, we understand the unique challenges and opportunities of each segment. Our expertise ensures that we source the best tech professionals adept at driving innovation in any retail environment, guaranteeing our clients a competitive edge in an ever-evolving market.
sectors.telco: At Huddle, we specialise in recruiting for a diverse range of Telco companies, from established telecommunications giants to innovative startups breaking new ground in tech. Whether it's mobile network operators, internet service providers, satellite communications firms, or cutting-edge VoIP enterprises, our expertise ensures we connect talented professionals with the perfect tech roles across the broad Telco spectrum. Partner with us to discover a world of opportunity in telecommunications recruitment.

originStory.title: Origin story
originStory.intro: In the bustling heart of the global job market, where opportunities and talent converge, the story of Huddle begins.

part1.text: Born from the vision of blending human expertise with transformative technology, Huddle was established by an exceptional trio: two seasoned recruitment experts and a tech innovator. Their shared goal? To reshape how recruitment agencies operate and redefine the job-seeking process.

part2.title: Meet the Founders
part2.text: Each founder brought their distinct strengths and insights to the table. The recruitment experts, with extensive experience in Executive Search, understood the significance of precision and personal connection in matching candidates with their ideal roles. The tech innovator, a forward-thinker in the realms of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML), recognised the potential of these tools to reshape and modernise the recruitment landscape.

originStory.quote1: "From its inception, Huddle's strategy has been anchored in prioritising your needs — whether you're a job seeker or an employer."

part3.title: The Bigger Picture
part3.text: Huddle was established to be a company that transcends the typical recruitment agency experience, serving as a direct strategic partner dedicated to guiding and supporting clients and candidates alike. Uniquely, their aspiration is to combine the meticulous practices of talent acquisition, with the efficiency, scalability, and predictive capabilities of AI and ML. At the heart of this blend lies an unwavering commitment to delivering an exceptional customer experience.

part4.title: Placing You First
part4.text: From its inception, Huddle's strategy has been anchored in prioritising your needs — whether you're a job seeker or an employer. The founders embarked on a thorough exploration, identifying the elements that underpin a successful recruitment partnership. This endeavour was grounded in practical insights that could drive tangible improvements.

originStory.quote2: "Each partnership between a candidate and a client contributes to the evolving story of a company that dared to envision recruitment differently."

part5.title: The Tech Advantage
part5.text: Enter Huddle's tech specialist, seamlessly integrating AI and ML into the fabric of the company's operations. However, this wasn't technology for technology's sake — it was about streamlining the process. Each application of AI and ML was carefully crafted to simplify recruitment. By automating routine tasks and employing predictive analytics for candidate-client matching, Huddle aimed to enhance efficiency and accuracy.

part6.title: The Present
part6.text: Today, Huddle stands as a guiding light for modern recruitment agencies. For job seekers, it opens doors to tailored opportunities. For companies, it serves as a gateway to a meticulously curated talent pool. Every interaction at Huddle underscores their dedication to customer satisfaction. Successful matches exemplify the harmonious blend of human expertise and cutting-edge technology. Each partnership between a candidate and a client contributes to the evolving story of a company that dared to envision recruitment differently.

part7.text: In a world where time is precious and talent is paramount, Huddle emerges as a reliable partner for rapidly and effectively assembling top-tier teams. Ready to benefit from the future of recruitment? Contact the Huddle team today.

footer.title: Because every search starts with a

lookingToHire.title: Looking to hire?
lookingToHire.desc: Source visionary engineers, innovative designers, and critical industry experts to gain a competitive edge in today's rapidly evolving technology landscape.

lookingForAJob.title: Looking for a job?
lookingForAJob.desc: Transform your tech career with Huddle. Reach out to find opportunities that meet your aspirations or for more helpful information.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.intro: The policy sets out the different areas where user privacy is concerned and outlines the obligations & requirements of the users, the website and website owners. Furthermore the way this website processes, stores and protects user data and information will also be detailed within this policy.

part1.title: The Website
part1.text: This website and its owners take a proactive approach to user privacy and ensure the necessary steps are taken to protect the privacy of its users throughout their visiting experience. This website complies to all UK national laws and requirements for user privacy.

part2.title: Cookie Policy
part2.text: This website uses cookies to better the users experience while visiting the website. Where applicable this website uses a cookie control system allowing the user on their first visit to the website to allow or disallow the use of cookies on their computer / device. This complies with recent legislation requirements for websites to obtain explicit consent from users before leaving behind or reading files such as cookies on a user’s computer / device.
part2.text2: The cookies in use to deliver Google Analytics service are used to store information, such as what time your current visit occurred, whether you have been to the site before, and what site referred you to the web page. These cookies contain no personally identifiable information but they will use your computer’s IP address to know from where in the world you are accessing the Internet. Google stores the information collected by these cookies on servers in the United States. Google may transfer this information to third-parties were required to do so by law, or where such third-parties process the information on Google’s behalf.

part3.title: Opt-out
part3.text: In order to provide website visitors with more choice on how data is collected by Google Analytics, Google has developed the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on. The add-on communicates with the Google Analytics JavaScript (ga.js) to stop data being sent to Google Analytics. The Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on does not affect usage of the website in any other way. A link to further information on the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on is provided below for your convenience.

part4.text: For more information on the usage of cookies by Google Analytics please see the Google website. A link to the privacy advice for this product is provided below for your convenience.

part5.title: Disabling Cookies
part5.text: If you would like to restrict the use of cookies you can control this in your Internet browser. Links to advice on how to do this for the most popular Internet browsers are provided below for convenience and will be available for the Internet browser of your choice either online or via the software help(normally available via key F1).

part7.title: Contact & Communication
part7.text: Users contacting this website and/or its owners do so at their own discretion and provide any such personal details requested at their own risk. Your Personal information is kept private and stored securely until a time it is no longer required or has no use, as detailed in the Data Protection Act 1998. Every effort has been made to ensure a safe and secure form to email submission process but advise users using such form to email processes that they do so at their own risk.
part7.text2: This website and its owners use any information submitted to provide you with further information about the products / services they offer or to assist you in answering any questions or queries you may have submitted. This includes using your details to subscribe you to any email newsletter program the website operates but only if this was made clear to you and your express permission was granted when submitting any form to email process. Or whereby you the consumer have previously purchased from or enquired about purchasing from the company a product or service that the email newsletter relates to. This is by no means an entire list of your user rights in regard to receiving email marketing material. Your details are not passed on to any third parties.

part8.title: Email Newsletter
part8.text: This website operates an email newsletter program, used to inform subscribers about products and services supplied by this website. Users can subscribe through an online automated process should they wish to do so but do so at their own discretion. Some subscriptions may be manually processed through prior written agreement with the user.
part8.text2: Subscriptions are taken in compliance with UK Spam Laws detailed in the Privacy and Electronic Communications Regulations 2003. All personal details relating to subscriptions are held securely and in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998. No personal details are passed on to third parties nor shared with companies / people outside of the company that operates this website. Under the Data Protection Act 1998 you may request a copy of personal information held about you by this website’s email newsletter program. A small fee will be payable. If you would like a copy of the information held on you please write to the business address at the bottom of this policy.
part8.text3: Email marketing campaigns published by this website or its owners may contain tracking facilities within the actual email. Subscriber activity is tracked and stored in a database for future analysis and evaluation. Such tracked activity may include; the opening of emails, forwarding of emails, the clicking of links within the email content, times, dates and frequency of activity [this is by no means a comprehensive list].
part8.text4: This information is used to refine future email campaigns and supply the user with more relevant content based around their activity. In compliance with UK Spam Laws and the Privacy and Electronic Communications Regulations 2003 subscribers are given the opportunity to unsubscribe at any time through an automated system. This process is detailed at the footer of each email campaign. If an automated un-subscription system is unavailable clear instructions on how to un-subscribe will by detailed instead.

part9.title: External Links
part9.text: Although this website only looks to include quality, safe and relevant external links, users are advised adopt a policy of caution before clicking any external web links mentioned throughout this website. The owners of this website cannot guarantee or verify the contents of any externally linked website despite their best efforts. Users should therefore note they click on external links at their own risk and this website and its owners cannot be held liable for any damages or implications caused by visiting any external links mentioned.

part10.title: Social Media Platforms
part10.text: Communication, engagement and actions taken through external social media platforms that this website and its owners participate on are custom to the terms and conditions as well as the privacy policies held with each social media platform respectively.
part10.text2: Users are advised to use social media platforms wisely and communicate / engage upon them with due care and caution in regard to their own privacy and personal details. This website nor its owners will ever ask for personal or sensitive information through social media platforms and encourage users wishing to discuss sensitive details to contact them through primary communication channels such as by telephone or email.
part10.text3: This website may use social sharing buttons which help share web content directly from web pages to the social media platform in question. Users are advised before using such social sharing buttons that they do so at their own discretion and note that the social media platform may track and save your request to share a web page respectively through your social media platform account.

part11.title: Shortened Links in Social Media
part11.text: This website and its owners through their social media platform accounts may share web links to relevant web pages. By default some social media platforms shorten lengthy urls [web addresses] (this is an example:http://bit.ly/zyVUBo). Users are advised to take caution and good judgement before clicking any shortened urls published on social media platforms by this website and its owners. Despite the best efforts to ensure only genuine urls are published many social media platforms are prone to spam and hacking and therefore this website and its owners cannot be held liable for any damages or implications caused by visiting any shortened links.

part12.title: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
part12.text: You can contact our Data Protection Officer on (hello@huddlesearch.com).
part12.text2: Everyone here at www.huddlesearch.com is familiar with the GDPR legislation,and exactly what their personal responsibilities are. Anyone joining the company is trained internally on induction day, and then at regular intervals of 2 years afterwards. If there is a change in legislation, then we ensure that everyone is fully up-to-date on the latest points.
part12.text3: You do have the right to be forgotten, and no longer receive any communication from us. You can do this via our contact form.
part12.text4: You can rest assured that absolutely no personal data is transferred outside of the EU under any circumstances (unless prior written consent is given by the person who’s data is to be transferred).
part12.text5:
When processing any data we abide by the following points:

– The processing of any data is lawful, fair and we are fully transparent about what the data is being used for
– We only collect data that is necessary for normal business operation
– All data is kept accurate and up-to-date
– Data is not kept for any longer than is reasonably necessary
– All data is kept safe and secure at all times If you have enquired about our services, then we have a legitimate interest in contacting you again to follow up on your enquiry.
part12.text6: If at this point you no longer wish to hear from us then we would welcome it if you could inform us of this, and we will no longer contact you and remove your data. As outlined above, all data is held securely, but in the unlikely event of a security breach, we do have a notification process in place.
part12.text7: If you would like to find out what data we hold about you, please use our contact form with a subject of DSAR Request.
part12.text8: This policy may be updated from time to time, so please ensure you check it regularly.
